suggest.meta_keywords: Turso database, Turso Starter Kit, edge functions, Azion Marketplace, GitHub integration, edge application deployment, Turso LibSQL SDK, edge computing templates, CRUD operations, template configuration
suggest.meta_description: Explore the Turso Starter Kit for seamless integration of Turso databases with Azion edge functions, featuring complete setup guides and GitHub integration.

current.meta_description: This template accelerates the integration of a Turso database, created using Turso's LibSQL SDK, into an edge function.
